Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or fresh frozen tissue sections
Purpose: To detect succinate dehydrogenase subunit B (SDHB) protein expression in tissue sections for diagnostic pathology evaluation.
Container: Charged microscope slide (for 4–5 µm tissue sections)
Equipment: Microtome, microwave or steamer for antigen retrieval, humidity chamber, Coplin jars
